name: Smoke: 1 unit, 1 type, hourly, with mount
description: Predictable smoke test. Deterministic hourly demand (0h..7h) to VMU-1. Mount 0.5h + flight 1.0h (cycle 1.5h). Expected with exactly one aircraft/pilot/SO and one SmartSensor: Request=8; feasible sequential starts at 0,2,4,6 → Start≈4, Complete≈4; Rejections≈4 (busy). With sufficient parallel resources (≥2 aircraft & payloads) higher Starts/Completions approach 8.
questions: Does payload availability affect rejections when mount time extends cycle to 1.5h?
Do timeline segments reflect mount before flight?
